description:
The Algorithmia Color Tool plugin provides powerful color processing capabilities for your Bubble app. With this tool, you can generate color palettes and convert colors between RGB and Hex formats seamlessly. It integrates with Algorithmia‚Äôs color algorithms to extract and suggest colors from images or generate palettes based on predefined colors. This plugin is ideal for applications that involve design, branding, or any feature requiring advanced color manipulation.                                 

[b]Usage Features:[/b] 

- Generate color palettes from images or predefined colors with the ‚ÄúGet Color Palette‚Äù data call.
- Easily convert RGB values to Hexadecimal format, making color manipulation more versatile and adaptable.
- Supports configuration of authorization headers, allowing for seamless integration with Algorithmia‚Äôs API.
- Options to define different authorization headers for development and production environments.

[size=5][b]Feedback[/b][/size] 

[img width=100% height=auto]https://d999c2fb1571594aedf60232928d50bd.cdn.bubble.io/f1730364919086x650133741442969700/algorith%20colors.webp[/img]

[size=5][b]Supported API Calls[/b][/size]

‚úÖ Get Color Palette - Retrieve a color palette based on image.
‚úÖ Convert RGB to Hex - Convert RGB color values into their corresponding hexadecimal format.
‚úÖ Get Color Palette - Access a color palette from an image or color input (duplicate entry).
‚úÖ Convert RGB to Hex - Transform RGB values to their hex representation (duplicate entry).

[size=5][b]FAQ[/b][/size]

- [b]How do I generate a color palette from an image?[/b]
Use the ‚ÄúGet Color Palette‚Äù data call, passing in the necessary image data. The API will return a range of colors extracted from the image, providing a ready-to-use palette.

- [b]Can I convert RGB values to Hex format with this plugin?[/b]
Yes, the plugin includes a ‚ÄúConvert RGB to Hex‚Äù action, which allows you to transform RGB color values into Hex format, suitable for various design and development needs.

- [b]Do I need an API key to use this plugin?[/b]
Yes, the plugin requires authorization headers, which can be set in the plugin‚Äôs configuration. Make sure to enter your Algorithmia API key in the designated field to enable the color processing features.

[b]Can I use different authorization headers for development and live versions?[/b]
Yes, you can set separate authorization headers for development and production environments, ensuring a secure and flexible setup.

- [b]Is this plugin capable of generating color suggestions based on custom inputs?[/b]
The plugin primarily generates color palettes based on input images or specified colors. For custom color suggestions, consider processing an image with the desired color attributes.

name: Algorithmia Color Tool
plugin_instructions:
API Key: You will need a API key from Algorithmia. (https://algorithmia.com/). Place in Plugin setting with Simple before API key (Simple XXXXXXXXXX). 

Using the Plugin:
- Get Color Palette - URL of Photo must start with http: or https:
- Number of Colors: How many Colors you want to return, if image contains more colors than submitted it will do the most common colors first.
- Convert RGB to Hex: Enter the RGB color in the following format: 12,71,171
